node.title: 'Super frustrating': As eastern states throw open international borders, hurdles remain in WA
node.alt: Two women hug while the media look on
node.description: Travel agents in Western Australia are being inundated with calls from people wanting to reconnect with family overseas as Australia's international border reopens — but plenty of hurdles remain.
node.content:
["As New South Wales and Victoria throw open\u00a0their international borders, allowing for family reunions at last, the picture on the west coast of the country could not be more different.", "Travel agents in Western Australia say they are being inundated with calls from people who want to re-connect with family overseas, but the continuing cap on arrivals into Perth means seats, on inbound flights\u00a0in particular,\u00a0are like \"gold dust\".", "Ceri Grantis of South Perth Travel says, like the rest of Australia, West Australians no longer\u00a0have to apply for an exemption to travel overseas.", "But not much else has changed.", "\"We are getting a lot of calls but in truth, nothing has changed for WA,\" she said.", "Jennie Bardsley of British Travel said there were currently five airlines flying in and out of Perth.", "But she said they had very few seats between them because of the travel cap, which is set at just 265 incoming passengers a week.", "", "
Jennie Bardsley owns independent Perth-based travel company British Travel.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "\"We generally don't have any economy class seats into Perth on the likes of Emirates, Singapore Airlines and Qatar until probably March,\" Ms Bardsley said.", "From this week,\u00a0fully vaccinated Australian citizens and permanent residents can travel overseas without having to apply for an exemption.", "New South Wales, Victoria and the ACT have also scrapped quarantine for double vaccinated\u00a0international arrivals, but other states are moving more cautiously, still mandating quarantine at home or in a hotel for up to 14 days.", "", "
Only a handful of airlines are currently flying from international destinations to Perth.
", "In Western Australia,\u00a0hotel quarantine at the traveller's considerable expense will remain in place\u00a0for the foreseeable future.", "Ms Bardsley said some travellers were\u00a0considering flying into other capital cities and then onto Perth, but that was also problematic.", "\"Lots of people are saying that they want to fly into Sydney or Melbourne and then come to Perth,\" she said.", "\"But, you can't get a G2G Pass [to enter WA] unless you are like a critical worker, or\u00a0an MP or Defence Force [personnel].\"", "", "
A Singapore Airlines plane at Canberra Airport.(ABC News)
", "As\u00a0the travel industry continues to press for a date that Western Australia will open up, Premier\u00a0Mark McGowan\u00a0has signalled the bottleneck into Perth is set to ease.", "\"When we get to 70 per cent double dose vaccination, we will double the number of returning Australians coming into our hotels so that will take it to 530 [passengers] per week,\" Mr McGowan said.", "As of yesterday, 62.2 per cent of WA's\u00a0population aged over 12 was fully vaccinated.\u00a0", "
Increase in arrivals cap equivalent to just two flights a week
", "Christian Hunter of the travel agents' umbrella group, Travellers Choice, welcomed the change but said it would make very little difference.\u00a0", "\"When you think that one medium-sized aircraft has got maybe 300 people on it, that's really only the equivalent of two flights a week,\" Mr Hunter said.", "\"So, it really is putting a lot of constraints on people's ability to travel.", "In the meantime, Ms Bardsley said some travellers from the United Kingdom\u00a0were asking to\u00a0fly\u00a0into Darwin on Qantas's\u00a0direct service from London, and then travel\u00a0onto Perth.", "But\u00a0she said Qantas had recently clarified that that was\u00a0not an option.", "\"Lots of people have had this assumption that they can come into Darwin,\" she said.", "\"But Qantas is now stating on its website that only residents of the Northern Territory can actually get off in Darwin.\"", "", "
Qantas has not yet resumed its international services from Perth.\u00a0(ABC News: Jason Om)
", "Adding to the demand for flights\u00a0are parents of Australian citizens\u00a0and permanent residents,\u00a0who the federal government said last month would be able to visit under new rules.", "Ms Bardsley\u00a0said her staff\u00a0had been fielding hundreds of inquiries from families about the new arrangement.", "On a positive note,\u00a0the industry believes airlines will ramp up services quickly once the McGowan government clarifies its plan for re-opening.", "\"The airlines will put the services on to support the population,\" Mr Hunter said.", "\"But, until such time\u00a0that we've got that commitment from the state, in terms of what reopening looks like, the airlines won't put their machinery into Western Australia because they can deploy it elsewhere where it can work well for them.\"", "
Overseas travel more complicated than ever\u00a0
", "Until that time, travellers are being urged to be cautious about going online and booking flights\u00a0which may not actually exist.", "\"There's heaps of ghost flights,\" Ms Bardsley said.", "\"Some of the airlines have basically got their schedules in the airline system because they don't want to lose their slot, and then they will cancel their flights a month before.\"", "", "
From this week, hotel quarantine and the cap on arrivals have been scrapped in NSW for fully vaccinated travellers.(AAP/Darren England)
", "At the same time, she said international travel had\u00a0become far more complicated, with many more considerations for travellers.", "\"The rules change all the time, it's not just a case of booking a flight anymore,\" she said.", "\"You've basically got to know the airline rules, the COVID test rules, you've got to know the transit rules, the country rules.", "\"It's not just a case of hopping online and booking something.", "\"Never has a travel agent been worth their value more than now.\""]
